name: Mr Runner
description:
Description:
In My game you jump other people to run away from the dragon that is trying to eat you. You must run as fast as you can and as fast as you can watch out of the people. Try to collect as many coins as possible before the dragon gets to you and eats you.

Instructions:
Jump over the people to run away from the dragon use the "Space bar" to jump.

Created by:

Robert Cox

Rizing Games
Cambridge Regional College
